title: HowdyLittleCrypto
author: HowdyLittleCrypto
content: My very first faucet is dedicated to Nano, here you can claim XNO currently once per week.Constructive feedback is welcome and since my coding skills s*cks, therefore please don't expect anything fancy for layout.I am going to post updates in this thread as I am planning some changes in the near future.

comments.author: HowdyLittleCrypto
comments.body: Double payment week is now over, weekly claims manually reviewed and payments sent. Thank you all for participating!
